creator: jari.aalto@cante.net
text:
Build fails with latest ant (1.6.a, from CVS)

W2kSp2 / Cygwin
Win32 JDK 1.4.1

root@W2KPICASSO:/cygdrive/d/java/apache/cvs/jakarta-taglibs$ ant.bat
Buildfile: build.xml

prepare:

creator: bayern@essentially.net
text:
The problem is unrelated to the Standard Taglib; the build that you've shown 
fails in the Regexp Taglib.

Problem is that CLASSPATH did not include the jakarta-oro package.
After I updated it form CVS, the build succeeded.

But those depricated warnings perhaps should be cleaned?

-jari

glenn@apache.org
text:
I can't find anyplace in the build where copyfile or copydir is used.
When ant 1.6 is released the builds will be updated for it.
